column5: Nice prizes Bly!!!
I just finished reading that book. Very informative.  If anyone is interested in the custom clocks, PM me for details
Ok...it's not enough that I'm not going fishing with you two on Monday.....LOL  The GPS will be on and marking every hole you fish at...you do know that right??? haha
I HAVE MY MILITARY SCRABBLER SO IT WILL THROW ALL YOUR WAY POINTS OFF!!!! YOU'LL BE FISHIN IN THE GM PARKING LOT  LOL
Nice goodies carole !!!!     cheers girl,go get-em

Thank you again friends for the birthday wishes!   Thought I would share a picture of a few of my fishing related gifts    GPS.....Lowrance H2O Color and the Nav Gold Chip.........Please please please can it be time to get the boat out on the lake now??  LOL  Clock.....Figure this is a great way to remind me why I sometimes get up at an obnoxiously early hour to go fishing  lol  Book....I have been trying to purchase a copy of this book since last winter, was always out of stock.  and a few other misc items from the local shops

Nice toys there Carole... Hope ya get a chance to use em alot this year on the water, well except for the clock which can be a lasting reminder to ... ahh you know what I was going to say  Have a good one! and I think the book is missing a Zero after The "what do you need to know to hook over ...
Congrats Carole!!!  Couldn't have happened to a more deserving gal!!!
Woot!.... Dang I knew I should have been nicer to Cliff and dropped more hints when my Birthday was nearing!! Dangit!  G
Good stuff. I read that steelhead book last winter, lots of good info.
Nice gifts! I just got that book a few days ago. It's a really good book. You'll definitely enjoy it.
Great to see no CTC 1/2 price sale stuff there....
Nice toys! Don't forget to mail in the coupon for your free "Fish n chip" from Navionics .
I was just looking up what that was....the info I saw was for continental USA only....or do they have a Canadian version as well?  I'll get it anyways...why not right?? LOL.

Funny you mention that....  Our local store is having it's one year anniversary....we picked up 3 adult life jackets (Reg 49.99) for 14.99 each just yesterday...LOL.  We figured for that price, we may as well have some extras kicking around.  Oh and if you do the math, that's about 70% off....
Mebbe you should try bunking with him.  JF
Good for you!!
awesome gifts congrats and happy birthday
Cliff i sent away and they sent me the one for my area pertaining to the card you bought, shows lots of detailed structure.
Cool...I'll be sending away for it for sure then!  Thanks for the info.
Congrats Carole.  Those are some greats gifts.  Where did you get he clock made Cliff?  Joey
Somebody Loves Ya I also was lucky enough to get the H2O unit ... wishin' I had the extra hundred bucks for the color unit. Put those to good use and celebrate your birthday over and over Carol.
NICE TOYS. CLIFF JUST GOT YOU THE GPS SO HE KNOWS WHERE IM TAKIN YOU ON MONDAY  LOL SNEAKY SNEAKY GUY  LOL

The Jim Butler Bible as I like to call it......must of read it 3-4 times cover to cover in the past year !!! Still haven't taken it out of the thrown , LOL .......great read, once you start you can't stop. That was my problem. Nice other gifts too.......the best chapter in my eyes was the chapter regarding fish positioning in a river...I had no clue that fish held in some of these places and how they move to different locations of the pool in turbide conditions.... the chapter on roe tying colors has also helped me a lot lately !!!
Cant go wrong with that, looks like a great birthday to me!  Hope you enjoy the clock!
wow very nice stuff, u have some very loving family  happy belated b-day
Very nice, Carole.  No jewellery or lingerie tho?
they didnt have cliffs size  lol
I think Cliff just wants to know where your going and when you'll be back. LOL  Congrats and Happy Birthday.
Congrats Carole and happy belated birthday
